org.epics.pvmanager.loc

Class LocalDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.pvmanager.DataSource
      • org.epics.pvmanager.loc.LocalDataSource

  • public class LocalDataSource
extends DataSource
    Data source for locally written data. Each instance of this data source will have its own separate channels and values.
    Author:
    carcassi

      do not use zero initialization of local variable: does not work for non numeric variables

      • LocalDataSource

        @Deprecated
public LocalDataSource(boolean zeroInitialization)
        Deprecated. do not use zero initialization of local variable: does not work for non numeric variables
        Zero initialization is deprecated. Will be removed in a future release.
        Parameters:
        zeroInitialization - whether to initialize variable to 0
